channel.title: [562] Need help with player pvp drops[562]
channel.description: Hey guys i need help with a 562 server thing, when players die in pvp wont drop it just dissapears,so i wanna make it so when players die they stuff gets dropped and be avaible to pick up:) so il be glad if someone could help me out with this one,Thanks...
